title: Fairy Tail
synopsis: Celestial wizard Lucy wants to join the Fairy Tail, a guild for the most powerful wizards. But instead, her ambitions land her in the clutches of a gang of unsavory pirates led by a devious magician. Her only hope is Natsu, a strange boy she happens to meet on her travels. Natsu's not your typical hero - but he just might be Lucy's best hope.Won the 33th Kodansha Manga Award for Best Shounen Manga.Won the Society for the Promotion of Japanese Animation's Industry Award for Best Comedy Manga.Spin-Offs:>Fairy Tail Zero( http://www.batoto.net/comic/_/comics/fairy-tail-zero-r12647 )>Tale of Fairy Tail: Ice Trail( http://www.batoto.net/comic/_/comics/tale-of-fairy-tail-ice-trail-r12648 )============Notice================Unfortunately the comic (or parts of it) was scanlated to English by groups that don't allow rehosting. Sorry for the inconvenience.==========Notice End==============
